concept.title: Morning Tasks
concept.shortdesc: A few things to help you get ready and get to school on time.

conbody.p: My guess is, you've woken up and Bridget and I have left for school. It's fine. Here are a few simple tasks that will help you get ready and get to school with time to spare. Text me (555-3319) or Bridget (555-8184) if you have any questions or want to know when we're going to be coming back.
